attributes.action: Help and funding to coincide with US efforts to stop Kony
attributes.additional_details:
http://vimeo.com/37119711
After watching this video, many will see that Joeseph Kony needs to be stopped by any means.
I believe that the British Government should help the US forces already in Uganda trying to help and without public support this can stop if they see it as no longer a public belief.
share this petition with family and friends, it needs to be acknowledged.
